|brand = BeagleBoard |model = BeagleBone |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Rev A6 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/03/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/BeagleBone |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Texas Instruments;Sitara AM3359;XAM3359AZCZ; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 720 <!-- --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = TF card |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Micron;MT47H128M16RT-25E:C; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN8710A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.04;-dirty; |stockos = Linux;3.8.11;Angstrom v2012.12;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, console port,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pad header,, unpopulated,, P7
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, I2C, SPI, GPIO, UART |addchip = 2-Port USB 2.0 Hi-Speed Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2412;;1;,,, Dual USB UART/FIFO Controller;FTDI;FT2232L;;1;,,, Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65217B;;1;,,, 256Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;ON Semi;CAT24C256;;1;,,, 2K Microwire Serial EEPROM;Microchip;93LC56B;;1;,,, Current-Limited, Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051;;1;,,, Over-voltage Protection Controller;ON Semiconductor;NCP349;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Regulator;Texas Instruments;TPS73701;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Solution for USB;TI;TPD4S012;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver w/Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC2G07;;1;, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.7.2 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = ''blank'' |manuf = CircuitCo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian
|availability = discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2012 |estprice = 89 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = USA
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The board can be powered by 2 different methods: *5V/1A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B 5V/1A
{{See also|BeagleBoard Devices|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[TI]]'' AM3359 ARM (Cortex-A8) @720MHz *Storage: TF card (32GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) SDRAM ([[Micron]]) *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Power: 5V/1A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://elinux.org/BeagleBone_Community#BeagleBone_.28original.29 ''BeagleBone (original)'' on '''Embedded Linux Wiki'''] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BeagleBoard#BeagleBone ''BeagleBone'' on '''Wikipedia''']
==See also== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[PocketBeagle]] • [https://beagleboard.org/pocket PPage]
